feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Accepted PhD Position
entry.content: Accepted a Cotutelle PhD position offered by Deakin and Coventry University in the area of Computer vision and pattern recognition.
entry.summary: Accepted a Cotutelle PhD position offered by Deakin and Coventry University

entry.title: Master of Science Degree
entry.content:
I was awarded a merit (high) in the field of Statistics from the Mathematics Department. Some of the courses I took include:

  • Reinforcement Learning
  • Machine Learning and Pattern Recognition
  • Probabilistic Modelling and Reasoning
  • Bayesian Data Analysis
  • Generalised Regression Models
  • Bayesian Theory
  • Incomplete Data Analysis
  • Fundamentals of Optimization
  • Statistical Programming
entry.summary: University of Edinburgh has awarded me a Master of Science in Statistics with Data Science
